item.title: UMassCTF 2025 - Falling Blocks
item.description: This is my second time being an author and organizer for UMassCTF. Since this year’s theme was flash/io games, it was a great opportunity for me to incorporate web game elements. So I decided to create a web challenge using WebSockets themed on the “Falling Blocks” game where the player has to dodge the falling blocks and the longer you survive the higher score you’ll get. The vulnerability itself wasn’t hard to find and exploit, but I aimed to make it subtle and more real-life-like.

item.title: UMassCTF 2024 - Holesome Birthday Party
item.description:
This is my first time being a CTF author and organizer for UMassCTF. I decided to make a beginner challenge that teaches basic skills in web exploitation.

Challenge Description

You just got invited to Spongebob’s birthday! But he’s decided to test your friendship with a series of challenges before granting you with the ticket of entrance. Can you prove that you’re truly his friend and earn your entrance to this holesome birthday party?
